About Valuable Capital
Founded in 2010, Valuable Capital is a subsidiary of Grand China Capital under Sina Group and it is a licensed online broker regulated by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission.
Valuable Capital is committed to providing a reliable investment platform for trading Hong Kong stocks, US stocks, A-shares, etc. Since its establishment, Valuable Capital has been awarded numerous accolades, showing that it is widely recognized by the industry and trusted by its clients.

Is Valuable Capital good? Key Features of Valuable Capital
You can find out if Valuable Capital suits you or not with the followings:
1. Competitive Commission
Valuable Capital charges competitive commissions for stock trading compared with other brokers or banks. In this way, you can save on brokerage and stock transaction fees to reduce your cost of investing. If you open an account through MoneySmart, you can even enjoy a commission fee waiver for Hong Kong stocks. If your investment portfolio focuses on Hong Kong stocks, Valuable Capital is a good choice for you.
2. One-stop Investment Service
Compared with other brokers which only allow trading Hong Kong and US stocks, Valuable Capital covers more investment products. Valuable Capital provides a one-stop investment service, allowing investors to subscribe new shares of an initial public offering (IPO) and trade Hong Kong stocks, US stocks, A shares, ETFs, funds, warrants or CBBCs. In this way, you can manage your diversified asset portfolio on one single platform.
3. Safe and Reliable
As a licensed broker in Hong Kong, Valuable Capital strictly complies with Hong Kong regulations. It also adopts the world's leading security encryption technology to ensure that customer ïinformation is kept safe during the transaction.The accounts opened in Valuable Capital are managed by Bank of China (Hong Kong) and Hong Kong Stock Exchange so investors’ funds are safe.
4. Free Streaming Quotes
New customers can enjoy a $288 free streaming quote service as long as they meet the initial deposit requirement of at least HK$20,000. Valuable Capital's streaming service will automatically update stock price, trading volume and other data continuously, which makes it a good choice for investors who would like to keep monitoring the markets closely.
5. Self-developed One-Stop Stock Trading System
The Valuable Capital App developed by Valuable Capital supports both computer and mobile versions. Customers can check the financial statement data of the past years anytime, anywhere to help them accurately analyze the stock market trend. At the same time, the app is connected to the Weibo forum, where customers can discuss investment strategies with like minded investors.
Valuable Capital - Deposit Payment Methods
Valuable Capital supports Hong Kong dollars, US dollars and offshore RMB deposits. Customers can deposit money through FPS, Bank-securities transfer or e-DDA. For online bank transfer, customers only need to transfer funds to your Valuable Capital account, and upload the proof of remittance (screenshot of successful transfer) and proof of bank accounts (such as monthly statements, bank cards and checkbooks, etc.).
Customers should note that the name of the bank account for depositing funds must be the same as that of the Valuable Capital’s account. Valuable Capital does not accept transfers from other people's or joint bank accounts.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
How long does it take to open an account with Valuable Capital?
After the customer submits the account opening application, Valuable Capital will complete the review in about 2-3 working days, and will send SMS and email to notify the customer of the result.
Is the commission charged for trading US/Hong Kong stocks through Valuable Capital?
